title: Butterfly Diamond Pendant with Gold Chain - Vasantha Haaram
materials: brilliant-cut Diamonds (approximately 0.71 carats total diamond weight). Features a fine
features: Delicate butterfly pendant set with sparkling diamonds in a prong setting, maximizing light reflection. The pendant glides along a meticulously crafted gold chain, showcasing a perfect balance of modern aesthetics and timeless elegance. The smooth chain design ensures comfortable wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with the dazzling white brilliance of the diamonds. A classic combination that exudes sophistication.
occasions: and adding a touch of elegance to any ensemble. Ideal for modern women who appreciate understated luxury.
description: A beautiful blend of contemporary design and precious materials. This pendant and chain set is a versatile addition to any jewelry collection, offering both style and inherent value. The diamonds are carefully selected for their brilliance and clarity, ensuring a captivating sparkle. The robust gold chain makes it a durable and wearable piece.
